item.title: 梅奥称，银行股已准备好在利率和软着陆背景下起飞
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）分析师迈克-梅奥（Mike Mayo）认为，随着美联储准备降低利率，美国经济几乎没有衰退迹象，银行股将迎来强劲反弹。【原文：With the Federal Reserve preparing to reduce interest rates and the US economy showing few signs of a recession, banks stocks are set up for a strong rally, according to Wells Fargo & Co. analyst Mike Mayo.】

item.title: 埃及签署石油价格波动对冲协议
item.description: 埃及总理穆斯塔法-马德布利（Mostafa Madbouly）在一次新闻发布会上说，埃及签署了大量石油产品价格波动对冲合同。【原文：Egypt signed contracts to hedge against price fluctuations for a large number of petroleum products, Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly said at a news conference.】

item.title: 土耳其里拉离岸汇率因套利头寸解除而跳涨
item.description: 在土耳其里拉持续下跌的情况下，交易商退出了所谓的套利头寸，因此在长周末前的周四，离岸市场隔夜拆借土耳其里拉的成本大幅上升。【原文：The cost of borrowing Turkish liras overnight in the offshore market jumped on Thursday before a long weekend as traders exited so-called carry positions amid a steady decline in the currency.】

item.title: 航空公司所有者阿布拉接近与城堡湖达成 13 亿美元贷款协议
item.description: 濒临破产的巴西航空公司 Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA 的最大股东即将达成一项协议，从投资公司 Castlelake LP 募集 13 亿美元资金，以避免其债券违约的风险。【原文：The largest shareholder of ailing Brazilian airline Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA is nearing a deal to raise $1.3 billion of funds from investment firm Castlelake LP to stave off the risk of defaulting on its bonds.】

item.title: 先买后付胜过私募基金卖家的大幅折扣
item.description: 希望出售私募基金股份的投资者让买家推迟几个月付款，而不是接受大幅折价。【原文：Investors looking to offload their stakes in private funds are letting buyers push back their payments by months rather than accept a big discount on the price.】

item.title: 赞比亚计划由国营公司拥有 30% 的关键矿产开采权
item.description: 赞比亚计划成立一家投资公司，该公司将控制未来矿山至少 30% 的重要矿物产量。【原文：Zambia plans to establish an investment company that will control at least 30% of critical minerals production from future mines.】

item.title: 美国签署在加纳建造小型模块化核电站的协议
item.description: 美国已同意帮助加纳建设首个小型模块化反应堆项目，以推动核技术成为非洲国家的清洁能源选择。【原文：The US has agreed to help build Ghana’s first small modular reactor project in a push to promote nuclear technology as a cleaner energy option for African countries.】

item.title: 法国高风险债务吸引看淡政治乱局的买家
item.description: 在经历了三个月的动荡之后，一小部分投资者开始抢购法国债务，而大多数基金则被拒之门外。【原文：A very small band of investors is starting to snap up French debt after three months of volatility turned off most funds.】

item.title: 壳牌将削减部分油气部门 20% 的工作岗位
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）首席执行官瓦埃勒-萨万（Wael Sawan）致力于提高效率和盈利能力，因此将裁减部分油气勘探与开发部门约 20% 的员工。【原文：Shell Plc is set to cut around 20% of its workforce in some oil and gas exploration and development divisions as Chief Executive Officer Wael Sawan works to boost efficiency and profitability.】

item.title: 利比亚石油停产加剧，五个码头停止装货
item.description: 利比亚暂停了东部五个港口的石油出口，在谁控制中央银行的僵局不断升级的情况下，该国的石油产量进一步下降。【原文：Libya suspended oil exports from five eastern ports, and the country’s output dipped further amid an escalating stalemate over who controls the central bank.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州官员因针对华尔街的反电子政务集团法遭到起诉
item.description: 美国可持续商业理事会起诉得克萨斯州官员，试图阻止一项因某些金融公司的能源政策而限制该州对其投资的法律。【原文：The American Sustainable Business Council sued Texas officials in an effort to block a law that restricts state investments with certain financial firms because of their energy policies.】

item.title: 银行贷款谈判陷入僵局，加纳将增加可可现货销售
item.description: 加纳官员说，加纳寻求增加可可的现货销售，因为它预计筹集到的资金不到下一个作物季节所需资金 15 亿美元目标的一半。【原文：Ghana seeks to increase spot sales of cocoa because it expects to raise less than half of its $1.5 billion target to fund the next crop season, officials said.】

item.title: Abry Partners 完成有史以来规模最大的信贷延续基金
item.description: 专注于中型市场公司的私募股权公司 Abry Partners 为其私募信贷工具之一完成了 16 亿美元的延续基金，这被称为迄今为止最大的此类基金。【原文：Abry Partners, a private equity firm focused on middle-market companies, closed a $1.6 billion continuation fund for one of its private credit vehicles in what it called the biggest such fund to date.】

item.title: 赞助商缩减 IPO 风险，欧洲将迎来大宗商品交易盛宴
item.description: 欧洲的基金经理们预计，夏季过后，上市公司现有股票的销售热潮将再次兴起，而私募股权投资持股可能成为供应来源。【原文：European fund managers expect a boom in sales of existing shares in listed companies to resume after the summer, with private equity holdings tipped as a likely source of supply.】

item.title: 2025 年芝加哥预算赤字将增至近 10 亿美元
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）宣布，由于养老金和劳动力成本的增加，芝加哥市 2025 年的财政赤字将接近 10 亿美元。该市还需要填补今年预算中的意外缺口。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson announced that city’s deficit for 2025 will be close to $1 billion because of higher pension and labor costs. The city will need to fill an unexpected shortfall in this year’s budget as well.】

item.title: 世界咖啡主要来自两个国家。这是一个问题
item.description: 秘鲁、泰国和其他小型生产商生产的咖啡曾经是对早晨饮品有特殊要求的咖啡爱好者的奢侈品。【原文：Coffee from Peru, Thailand and other smaller producers used to be a luxury for dedicated drinkers particular about their morning brew.】

item.title: 美国成屋待售指数降至历史最低点
item.description: 由于高房价和借贷成本继续吓退购房者，7 月份美国现房待售量降至历史最低水平。【原文：A gauge of pending US sales of existing homes sunk in July to the lowest level on record, as high prices and borrowing costs continue to scare buyers away.】

item.title: 摩根大通坚持看涨墨西哥比索，竞争对手银行纷纷退出
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The Mexican peso’s three-month slide has made it a bargain for investors willing to stomach the market turbulence that likely lies ahead, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 意大利航空燃油销量创历史新高是欧洲经济复苏的标志
item.description: 意大利上个月的航空燃油销量达到了至少 22 年来的最高水平，这表明欧洲市场在经历了 19 世纪科维德疫情多年的缓慢复苏后，正在恢复稳健增长。【原文：Italy’s jet fuel sales last month reached their highest level in at least 22 years, signaling that the European market is returning to solid growth after years of slow recovery from the Covid-19 pandemic.】

item.title: 据说伊比利亚-德拉公司将考虑退出台湾和越南业务
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，伊比利亚-德拉公司（Iberdrola SA）正在考虑退出台湾和越南市场，因为该公司正专注于更大的市场。【原文：Iberdrola SA is considering pulling out of Taiwan and Vietnam as it focuses on its larger markets, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元本月表现糟糕是其他主要货币的福音
item.description: 本月，美联储降息的临近令美元备受煎熬，导致这一世界储备货币下滑，并引发全球主要同类货币的反弹。【原文：The proximity of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts is tormenting the US dollar this month, sending the world’s reserve currency slumping and igniting rallies in major peers across the globe.】

item.title: 亿万富翁安巴尼将清洁能源视为新的增长引擎
item.description: 信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd. ）董事长穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）表示，该公司新兴的清洁能源业务有望在七年内达到今天石油化工业务的规模。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd.’s nascent clean energy business is poised to reach the size of today’s oil-to-chemicals operation within seven years, Chairman Mukesh Ambani said.】

item.title: 沃尔玛和道明证券交易额创五月份以来新高
item.description: 沃尔玛以 36 亿美元的价格退出中国的京东商城，使 8 月份成为自 5 月份以来美国新股和已上市公司股票销售最繁忙的一个月。【原文：Walmart Inc.’s $3.6 billion exit from China’s JD.com Inc. helped make August the busiest month since May for US sales of new and existing shares in already-public companies.】

item.title: 国债收益率上升，因数据显示美联储采取了稳健措施
item.description: 美国国债收益率走高，此前经济报告表现强劲，促使交易商小幅下调了对美联储今年宽松政策范围的预期。【原文：US Treasury yields edged higher after resilient economic reports prompted traders to slightly trim their expectations for the scope of Federal Reserve easing this year.】

item.title: 暴雨将淹没印度最大的棉花和花生种植区
item.description: 据预测，印度最大的棉花和花生种植区本周将继续遭遇暴雨和强风，从而增加了洪水的风险，并威胁到几周后即将收获的农作物。【原文：India’s biggest cotton and peanut growing areas are forecast to continue witnessing heavy rains and strong winds this week, raising the risk of floods and threatening the crops that are just weeks away from harvesting.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气贸易释放长期燃料承诺信号
item.description: 欧洲天然气贸易商正在竞标更长期的合同，他们认为，即使该地区向可再生能源过渡，燃料需求在 2030 年代仍将保持高位。【原文：European gas traders are bidding into longer-term contracts with a view that fuel demand will remain elevated well into the 2030s, even as the region transitions to renewables.】

item.title: 资金短缺的安哥拉用国库券支付当地供应商的货款
item.description: 安哥拉财政部称，由于这个石油资源丰富的国家政府没有足够的现金，它将延长用国库券支付当地供应商的做法。【原文：Angola’s Finance Ministry said it will extend the practice of paying local suppliers with Treasury bills because the oil-rich nation’s government doesn’t have sufficient cash.】

item.title: 西非丰收在即，可可受降雨预报影响跌幅扩大
item.description: 由于预报西非将出现降雨，可可期货连续第三天下跌，从主要生产国象牙海岸和加纳干旱天气引发的一周涨势中回落。【原文：Cocoa futures fell for a third day on forecasts of rain in West Africa, pulling back from a weeklong rally fueled by concerns over dry weather in key producers Ivory Coast and Ghana.】
